data.name: AboutPageText
data.value: We are an Irish owned software development and digital solutions company that was established in 2012, located in County Wicklow, Ireland.|We have software development experience in various technologies and offer cross-platform development services and support to both Irish and international clients.|We are a small expert in-house team, whose scalable adaptive work model of utilising highly qualified remote specialist in different fields, enable us to bring the latest developmental expertise to the table to deliver high quality custom solutions.|By teaming-up with well-established remote developers, we can assess each individual project’s unique requirements in terms of scope of work and skills needed and bring together a perfect-fit development team. Our business model allows us to perform with increased productivity so that we can offer you cost-efficient products that is built on the latest technologies and platforms.

data.name: Address
data.value: SiliconRock Limited,|6 Tinnapark Drive,|Kilpedder,|A63P621,|County Wicklow,|Republic of Ireland

data.name: HomeAboutText
data.value: SiliconRock is an Irish company of expert software engineers and graphic designers. We offer professional software applications and digital solutions that allow our clients to achieve greater operational efficiency.

data.name: HomeContactText
data.value: Find out how to contact us so we can help you optimise your productivity and streamline your business.

data.name: HomeSolutionsHeader
data.value: Our Solutions Are Based On 3 Core Values:

data.name: HomeSolutionsText
data.value: Custom, tailored solutions to suit your unique needs|Robust solutions that are dynamic and easily maintainable to allow future growth|Client-centric and affordable solutions

data.name: SolutionsPageText
data.value:
Scalable Adaptive Work Model: At SiliconRock we know that a one-stop-shop does not allow for affordable future-proof solutions and have embraced a scalable adaptive work model by collaborating with remote developers.

This allows us a more effective workflow with a faster time to operational stage without compromising quality. This scalable adaptive work model allows us to pass the dividends and benefits on to our clients.| Access to Specialists in their Field: We have a close working relationship with a talented pool of developers who have in-depth knowledge across various technology stacks and can draw on their niche skills to best suit your needs.

Our project manager is experienced in managing remote teams and delivering first-rate projects successfully.| Access to the Latest Technologies and Platforms: Hand-picking qualified specialist in their field enables us to stay on top of emerging new technologies and to create future-proof solutions that will keep pace with today’s rapid technology shifts.| Bespoke Solutions: Our broad experience in working with remote developers allows us to assess each project’s unique requirements and find the correct skillset and best technology to suit your needs.| Faster Time-to-Market: Selecting a team with the right set of experience and skills to best match the project requirements allow for greater flexibility that increases productivity and saves time.| Reducing Cost of Development: Our scalable adaptive work model allows us to scale the operation to the requirements of each individual client, thus streamlining the development process to keep costs affordable.|
